TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentTray extends System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider
Public Class ComponentTray Inherits ScrollableControl Implements IExtenderProvider
type ComponentTray = class inherit ScrollableControl interface IExtenderProvider

summary.span: 为设计器的组件栏提供行为。

span.span: Provides behavior for the component tray of a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件栏表示不另外提供一个可视界面，在设计时的组件，并提供让用户访问和设置这些组件的属性的方法。The component tray represents components that do not otherwise provide a visible surface at design time and provides a way for users to access and set the properties of those components. 某些类型的组件，如，可能没有一个用户界面，可以在设计时查看。Some types of components, such as a , may not have a user interface that can be viewed at design time. 这些组件通常由在组件栏中显示的图标表示。These components are usually represented by icons that are shown in the component tray. 组件栏是处于活动状态后在设计视图模式下，设计视图窗口的底部显示的矩形区域。The component tray is a rectangular region displayed at the bottom of the design view window while in design view mode, once it is active. 后，将显示在组件栏中的组件已添加到或属于当前文档，组件栏将设计视图中处于活动状态。The component tray becomes active in design view after a component that is displayed in the component tray has been added to or is part of the current document.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified designer and service provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件栏监视组件的添加和删除，并显示相应的用户界面对象来表示它所包含的组件。The component tray monitors component additions and removals and displays appropriate user interface objects to represent the components it contains.

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅 [实现释放 Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息和，请参阅 [清洗向上非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
